startingPosition.instruction: Lie flat on the back. Legs together and straight. Arms by the sides and palms down. Head, neck and spine in a straight line. Bend both the knees and place both the soles on the floor, in front of the buttocks, keeping knees and feet together. Interlock the fingers of hands, and place the palms under the back of the head. Elbows touch the floor.

technique.instruction: Exhaling lower the legs to the right and bring the knees to the floor. Turn the head and neck to the left.
Exhaling lower the legs to the left and bring the knees to the floor. Turn the head and neck to the right.
Inhaling return to the center and that is step 1.

info: Deep breathing should be done and movement should be in sync with the breathing.
Gently push out the abdomen with inhalation and exhaling return to the starting position. Repeat 5 times.
